context:
| Option Awards |  | Stock Awards | 
--- | --- | --- | --- | ---
Name | Number of Shares Acquired on Exercise (#) | Value Realized on Exercise ($) | Number of Shares Acquired on Vesting (#) | Value Realized on Vesting ($)
Jon Kirchner | — | — | 153,090 | 3,428,285
Robert Andersen | — | — | 24,500 | 578,806
Paul Davis | — | — | 20,500 | 482,680
Murali Dharan | — | — | 15,000 | 330,120
Geir Skaaden | — | — | 21,100 | 500,804

paragraph 1: Option Exercises and Stock Vested
paragraph 2: The table below sets forth information concerning the number of shares acquired on exercise of option awards and vesting of stock awards in 2019 and the value realized upon vesting by such officers.
paragraph 3: (1) Amounts realized from the vesting of stock awards are calculated by multiplying the number of shares that vested by the fair market value of a share of our common stock on the vesting date.

qa.question: How many shares did Jon Kirchner acquire in 2019 through exercise and vesting, respectively?
